pages.text: The $(l:utility/beehive)hives$(/l) can house up to 3 $(l:mobs/bee)bees$(/l) at a time. Bees fly into the nest at night, during rain, and after pollinating.$(br)Igniting the hive causes all bees inside to escape from it.

pages.title: Total Beelocation
pages.text: Move a $(l:utility/beehive#nest)Bee Nest$(), with 3 $(l:mobs/bee)bees$() inside, using the Silk Touch enchantment
